interface.name: org.alljoyn.FileTransfer
interface.description: This interface provides methods for performing chunky file transfers

property.name: MaxWriteLength
property.description: The total amount of write space available in bytes.

method.name: StartChunkWrite
method.description: Method that starts a chunky write data transfer from a consumer to a producer

method.name: WriteNextChunk
method.description: Method that writes the next sequential chunk of data from a consumer to a producer

method.name: StartChunkRead
method.description: Method that starts a chunky read data transfer from a producer to a consumer

method.name: ReadNextChunk
method.description: Method that returns the next sequential chunk of data from a producer to a consumer
